issue.title: [C++] Implement Schema unification, merging unequal but equivalent schemas
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-843](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-843). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Some Parquet datasets may contain schemas with mixed REQUIRED/OPTIONAL repetition types. While such schemas aren't strictly equal, we will need to consider them equivalent on the read path
